diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Diverticulitis/Transverse Colitis, Pleural effusion, Pancreatitis with pseudocysts, Secondary diabetes
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with fever and cough, and CT imaging revealed a large nonhemorrhagic left pleural effusion and thickening of the proximal transverse colon bowel wall suggestive of diverticulitis. Previous history of pancreatitis with multiple pseudocysts was noted, and absence of other acute symptoms supported the diagnosis.
